title: RTCPeerConnection: currentRemoteDescription property
summary:
The read-only property
  RTCPeerConnection.currentRemoteDescription returns an
  RTCSessionDescription object describing the remote end of the connection
  as it was most recently successfully negotiated since the last time the
  RTCPeerConnection finished negotiating and connecting to a remote peer.
  Also included is a list of any ICE candidates that may already have been generated by
  the ICE agent since the offer or answer represented by the description was first
  instantiated.
pageTitle: RTCPeerConnection: currentRemoteDescription property - Web APIs | MDN
